comments.author: azakai@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
Test lives in layout/reftests/font-matching. Works on Firefox, fails on Fennec on linux desktop.

Will attach image and reference. Looks like the hebrew font is incorrectly sized, both the font itself and the text in english near it that gives its name.
